trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a SAML security token that asserts the subject's name.

Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource> class to create a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> instance for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> subject name claim.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource> 类创建 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> 主题名称声明的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class has a constructor that takes a resource, which this class can be passed to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> 类具有一个构造函数，它采用可以将该类传递到的资源作为参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify the subject of the security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定安全令牌的主题。

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型，其中一个类型为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement> asserts the principal that is the subject of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement> 断言作为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌的主题的主体。

trans-unit.source: This principal is specified using a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject> class.
trans-unit.target: 此主体是使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject> 类指定的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource> class represents the name identifier for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource> 类表示 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject> 的名称标识符。

trans-unit.source: The subject name.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.Name" /> property.
The domain in which the <c>name</c> parameter resides.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier" /> property.
A URI reference that represents the format that the <c>name</c> parameter is in.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format" /> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource" /> class using the specified name, the domain in which the name resides, and the format the name is in.
Although the format used to specify a name is extensible, the following table lists the formats defined by the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定名称的格式是可扩展的，下表列出了 SAML 规范所定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an email address.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题指定为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified using a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题是使用 Windows 域帐户指定的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
An object to compare to this instance.
Returns a value that indicates whether the instance is equal to the specified object.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource" /> and has the same value as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets a URI reference that represents the format that the subject name of a SAML security token is in.
A URI reference that represents the format that the subject name of a SAML security token is in.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI 引用，它表示 SAML 安全令牌的主题名称所采用的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format%2A> property specifies the format that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> property is in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format%2A> 属性指定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> 属性所采用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Although the format used to specify a name is extensible, the following table lists the formats defined by the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定名称的格式是可扩展的，下表列出了 SAML 规范所定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an email address.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题指定为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified using a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题是使用 Windows 域帐户指定的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format%2A> property corresponds to the `Format` attribute of the `<saml:NameIdentifier>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format%2A> 属性 (Property) 对应于 OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 断言和协议规范中定义的 `Format` 元素的 `<saml:NameIdentifier>` 属性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource" />.
A hash code for the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource" />.
Gets the subject name of a SAML security token.
The subject name of a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 安全令牌的主题名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format%2A> property specifies the format that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> property is in and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier%2A> property specifies the domain in which the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> property resides in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Format%2A> 属性指定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> 属性所采用的格式，而 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier%2A> 属性指定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> 属性所在的域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> property corresponds to the `Format` attribute of the `<saml:NameIdentifier>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> 属性 (Property) 对应于 OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 断言和协议规范中定义的 `Format` 元素的 `<saml:NameIdentifier>` 属性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the domain in which the subject name of a SAML security token resides in.
The domain in which the subject name of a SAML security token resides in.
trans-unit.target: SAML 安全令牌的主题名称所在的域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier%2A> property specifies the domain in which the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> property resides in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier%2A> 属性指定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.Name%2A> 属性所在的域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier%2A> property corresponds to the `NameQualifier` attribute of the `<saml:NameIdentifier>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlNameIdentifierClaimResource.NameQualifier%2A> 属性 (Property) 对应于 OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 断言和协议规范中定义的 `NameQualifier` 元素的 `<saml:NameIdentifier>` 属性 (Attribute)。
